name: After Dusk (Eyes)
description: After Dusk is a 2D survival game where the player must fight off zombies before they get to the player. The game is visually all stunning pixel art. Zombies rise from a grave and begin to chase the player. If the player kills the zombie, the score increases, if the zombie kills the player, the score decreases. After Dusk is a very fun, easy to learn game. Can you survival until dawn?
